item.title: Getting started with OpenTelemetry and distributed tracing in .NET Core
item.description: Show me the code If you don’t care about the post I have upload the code on my Github A few months ago the first stable version of the OpenTelemetry client for dotnet was released and since then I have wanted to write a little bit about it. OpenTelemetry is a set of APIs, SDKs, tooling and integrations that are designed for the creation and management of telemetry data such as traces, metrics, and logs.
